summary: Encapsulates a HeatmiserV3 thermostat, exposing its current operation mode, temperature readings, auxiliary‑heat status, configurable temperature range, device name, supported capabilities, target setting, step granularity, unit of measurement, and provides actions to adjust the setpoint, toggle auxiliary heating, and refresh the device state.
business_intent: Enable integration of the Heatmiser thermostat into home‑automation or energy‑management platforms, allowing remote monitoring and precise control of heating parameters to improve comfort and efficiency.
